Name: Sinignesigui Group
description:
Abou is the one who is holding the cow's horn in the photo. He is Malian and raises cattle. He is 48 years old, married, and the father of 15 children. His children are aged from two to 22 years old. Four of the children attend school. Abou himself attended Koranic school and can read. His wife runs the household.

Abou buys his animals from the surrounding weekly markets and makes his sales in the same markets. Thanks to support from RMCR, his farming does well.

He is very happy that in his job he makes enough profits and he also has organic manure for his fields. He has no complaints about his livestock farming.

Profits he earns helps him to take better care of his family. He hopes in the coming days to have more profits so that he can build a home out of sheet metal for his family's well-being.
